description:
The MOD11_L2.005 dataset was decommissioned as of April 9, 2018. 

The MODIS/Terra level-2 Land Surface Temperature and Emissivity (LST/E) data (Shortname: MOD11_L2) incorporate 1 km pixels, which are produced daily at 5-minute increments using the generalized split-window algorithm. This algorithm is optimally used to separate ranges of atmospheric column water vapor and lower boundary air surface temperatures into tractable sub-ranges. The surface emissivities in Bands 31 and 32 are estimated from land cover types.

The data inputs include the MODIS L1B calibrated and geolocated radiances, geolocation, cloud mask, atmospheric profiles, land and snow cover. The MOD11_L2 data set comprises swath data obtained in 5-minute sensor collection periods, and includes the following Science Data Set (SDS) layers: LST, quality control assessment, error estimates, Bands 31 and 32 emissivities, zenith angle of the pixel view, observation time, and the geographic coordinates for every five scan lines and samples. Produced daily, MOD11_L2 is an unprojected level-2 product, which provides the input for the level-3 products.

The Terra/MODIS V5 LST/E products, including the MOD11_L2, are validated to Stage-2 with well-defined uncertainties over a range of representative conditions. Further details regarding MODIS land product validation for the LST/E products are available from the MODIS land team validation site at http://landval.gsfc.nasa.gov/ProductStatus.php?ProductID=MOD11.

The V5 collection is not consistent with V4 and V41, and users should exercise caution as they plan to use the different collections.  Please refer to the LP DAAC MODIS product table at https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/products/modis_products_table/mod11_l2  for additional detailed product version information.

V005 Data Set Characteristics: 
Area: ~2330 km x 2000 km lat/long 
Image Dimensions: 2030 x 1354 rows/columns 
File Size: ~2.4 MB 
Resolution: 1000 meters 
Projection: None (swath data)
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS HDF Layers): 9
title: MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity 5-Min L2 Swath 1km V005

usgs.title: Direct Download [1]
usgs.description: USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.
